In addition to attaching a payment plan to a payment, you also have the option of directly attaching a payment plan to a customer. Adding a plan to a customer directly has a variety of potential applications, such as offering an initial free trial period as part of a subscription. To attach a payment plan to a customer, navigate to the *Customers Screen* and select your desired customer. At the bottom of the *Customer View* screen, press *Add Payment Plan*. This will prompt the below form. Once completed, press Save.

Dropdown menu of cards currently attached to the customer. 
Optional Start Date 
Date of the first recurring payment. If left blank, the date of the first recurring payment will be equal to the current date plus the frequency. For example, if the current date is 01-01-2018 and the frequency is Monthly, the start date of the plan will be 01-02-2018 if Optional Start Date is left blank. 
 
If you open the customer view from the Customers Screen, you will see a summary of the Payment Plan towards the bottom section of the window (click the blue down arrow to expand).

You'll also notice three options: Suspend, Edit and Delete. * **Suspend**: Cancels all scheduled recurring payments belonging to the plan. Note that this only suspends the plan for the single customer, not all customers subscribed to the plan. Click Enable to take the plan out of suspension. * **Edit**: Allows you to select a different customer card to the payment plan. Click Save to save your changes. * **Delete**: Removes the payment plan from the customer. Click Delete, then click Yes to confirm.
